title: OPL Team Plat+
body:
Will be starting a team for the 2018 season. 
This is for serious players only don't bother adding me if your not committed to the game or don't have enough time to practice. 
I am a support main and have yet to have any members so all roles are still on the table. 
Not doing this for fun, I want to see how far we can sctuslly go through hard work and perseverance. 
Must be open to criticism and be wanting to learn as a player and improve, No exceptions for me. I don't like people who rage, if you die it was because of you and no one else.

If you feel like your the person I described above add me in game and we will see where it goes from there. GLHF :)

Ign:Smokin
